divs: sighting detailshi... i took these pics before the new year. i don't remember if it was the 28,29 or 30 of december 2012. it was a clear night. approx. 9:30-10:30pm. no wind or cloud cover. i noticed a very obvious light in the southwest sky. it was incredibly apparent, yet i'd never noticed \ seen it before. it seemed to have 3 different colours, red\blue\white which seemed to intermittently blink on and off. i did not immediately think it was a ufo but found it intriguing so i hopped in my car and drove to the beach where there is less light interference to have a closer look. it started off as a weird bright light abot 45-50��� in the sky... it would get very bright, then dim to nothing more than a pin-prick in the sky and then get bright again.... it wasn't moving from side to side... or up and down. then it split into 3 lights . i kept taking pics and then a shape emerged on my camera...didn't really notice it until i looked at the pic at home and enlarged it a bunch of times.... i was showing a colleague this morning and he asked "what happens if you turn the pic upside down?" well, i'm not sure about the 3 lights, but the "metallic" object when turned upside down looks like a "craft" of some sort to me! it actually almost has a "stealth jet" like appearance..i don't believe that it is a stealth jet...but maybe something other worldly that resembles that shape. i'm sending this from my phone, but if you are able to rotate the metallic object pic on your computer and post it alongside the others, it would be appreciated.
Summary: Bright pulsating light (star-like), split into 3 lights. 3 lights disappeared and metallic object appeared.
